ygData.subject: Survey and New List Format
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, folks... I ve put up a survey at http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/EQ_SMITHS, please feel free to head to that URL and cast your vote.  If there s
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings, folks...

I've put up a survey at http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/EQ_SMITHS,
please feel free to head to that URL and cast your vote. If there's a
survey question you have burning in your mind, please email me DIRECTLY
with that question, and in a short time, I'll post it up. :)

Also, as a change of list format, we'll begin to discuss all aspects of
Smithing -- from Blacksmithy, to Jewelsmithy, to Tailoring as they all
tie in, in some way or another. We're currently up to 95 subscribers
and a larger base would definitely help us all in getting some questions
answered -- please tell a friend to subscribe. :)

Chade
chade@...
Povar
